Set up session memory

Source: R/iSEE-extras.R
INTERNAL_setup_memory.Rd

Set up the parameter memory for every individual panel of every panel type, for a particular session of the app.

.setup_memory(se, redDimArgs, colDataArgs, featAssayArgs, rowStatArgs,
  rowDataArgs, sampAssayArgs, colStatArgs, customDataArgs, customStatArgs,
  heatMapArgs, redDimMax, colDataMax, featAssayMax, rowStatMax, rowDataMax,
  sampAssayMax, colStatMax, customDataMax, customStatMax, heatMapMax)

Arguments

se

A SingleCellExperiment object.
redDimArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for reduced dimension plots.
colDataArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for column data plots.
featAssayArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for feature assay plots.
rowStatArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for row statistics tables.
rowDataArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for row data plots.
sampAssayArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for sample assay plots.
colStatArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for column statistics tables.
customDataArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for custom data plots.
customStatArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for custom statistics tables.
heatMapArgs

A DataFrame or data.frame of user-specified arguments for heat maps.
redDimMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of reduced dimension plots.
colDataMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of column data plots.
featAssayMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of feature assay plots.
rowStatMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of row statistics tables.
rowDataMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of row data plots.
sampAssayMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of sample assay plots.
colStatMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of column statistics tables.
customDataMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of custom column plots.
customStatMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of custom statistics tables.
heatMapMax

Integer scalar specifying the maximum number of heat maps.

Value

A list of DataFrames, where each DataFrame corresponds to a panel type and contains the initial settings for each individual panel of that type. Each row of the DataFrame is also named according to the encoded name of the panel it represents (e.g., "redDimPlot2").

Details

The maximum number of panels for each panel type is defined as the maximum of *Max and nrow(*Args) for that type. This is unless the panel type is not feasible (see .check_plot_feasibility) in which case the maximum number is set to zero.

This function will generate a default set of parameters for each panel type with the appropriate *Defaults function. It will then call .override_defaults to replace the defaults with user-specified values in *Args. Not all arguments need to be specified of a given panel type; similarly, arguments do not need to be specified for all panels of a given type

Each of the *Args can also be NULL, in which case they are ignored and only the defaults are used. However, each of the *Max values must be specified.

In each DataFrame, some parameters can be specified as strings for convenience, while internally being represented as integer indices. Any such string values are converted to integers using the .name2index function, for consistency in downstream processing. See the Type parameter in redDimPlotDefaults for an example.

See also

iSEE, .name2index, .check_plot_feasibility
